title: Marcy Kaptur - Wikipedia
snippet: She later supported the measure, voting in favor of the DREAM Act in 2021. Kaptur voted against the Equal Representation Act in 2024, which proposed excluding noncitizens ineligible to vote from the population counts used to determine congressional representation. title: Congresswoman Marcy Kaptur |Representing the 9th District of Ohio
snippet: Kaptur Statement On Federal Inaction From HHS And Impact On Toledo Teachers, Students, And Head Start Program · December 1, 2025 | Press Release · Toledo, OH – Today, Congresswoman Marcy Kaptur (OH-09) released the following statement after the Department of Health and Human Services (HHS) failed to provide funding for Toledo Public Schools Head Start Program, causing the closure of the program effective immediately, today December 1st.
